text:
Sentry | http://getsentry.com | Full-time in San Francisco

Come help us develop our open source exception monitoring service: http://github.com/getsentry/sentry.

Sentry is a small team (just 9 people) with a beloved product, a long list of notable customers, strong and growing revenue, and a commitment to open source. This is a really good time to be a part of what we're building.

We're particularly interested in hiring an experienced JavaScript engineer to help work on Sentry's React + Flux front-end, and contribute to our JavaScript client SDKs (raven-js, raven-node).

Full list of roles is available here: http://getsentry.com/jobs, or reach out to me directly to find out more: ben (at) getsentry.com.
